QuestData.Title: Apex Predator
QuestData.Description: I have good news and bad news, $r.$b$bThe bad news is that they somehow managed to capture and train a Devilsaur.$b$BThe good news is that it doesn't seem to have a collar and is tame. I imagine it must think that one of the Nightborne in there is its master. Find the pack leader and take him out, and we will set quite a beast upon them.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Find and slay the Nightborne keeping Su'esh obedient.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and slay the Nightborne keeping Su'esh obedient.
QuestData.RewardText: I saw everything from out here. That was... messy.
